title: Cre4tures - Scrowl: Creature Sounds and Phrases
description: A collection of 202 audio files of words, phrases, and utterances from the slick Cre4ture "Scrowl"
longDescription:
Audio Preview: SOUNDCLOUD


Scrowl is the 2nd creature release in 4 Chamber Sound's "Cre4ture" Series and is also found in part of the bundle "Cre4ture Series: Volume 1"


Scrowl is a nasally, irritating, sneaky and deceptive bird-like creature. Don't be fooled by his high voice though, he is sure to leave you scratching your head by telling you what you want to hear but never following through on a promise.


Audio files in this package range from simple, common responses and a variety of numbers, to grunts, growls and other emotion-filled babbling. See below for full list of all phrases. Don't see a phrase that you need? Reach out to Matt at 4chambersound@gmail.com for custom audio
